StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Specialized farming: Hydroponics (Part 1)
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: Tired of dirty soil? Build cool water pools infused with electrolytes to farm your potatoes.. INSIDE!

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Specialized farming: Hydroponics (Part 2)
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: Now that we know how to make solar panels out of some steal and some old component, it is time to do so!

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Get a power source!
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: First we need a power source. RimWorld offers multiple ones, Wood and Chemfuel generators, Solar and Geothermal generators or even a watermill generator if you have a river on your map!\nHowever we only have access to the wood and chemfuel generators currently, build two of either one.

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Research batteries.
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: Now with a power source, we need some place to get all that excess energy stored.\nBatteries!\nBatteries will store any extra energy produced for later use, so in-case you have a power outtage, no worries! Batteries will save the day, but we don't know how to build one yet...

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Store the Power!
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: You have received some resources to build a few batteries, you won't receive any more though!

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Research solar panels.
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: While fueled generators have a decent steady output, specialized generators produce a good amount of energy when certain conditions apply. Like solar panels! Solar panels produce energy during the day, and stop working at night.\nTime to find out how it works!

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Harvest the sun!
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: Now that we know how to make solar panels out of some steal and some old component, it is time to do so!

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Research geothermal generators.
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: Time to get some more advanced energy sources! A geothermal generator may only be placed on steam geysers, however it will create a steady amount of energy.

StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.label: Hellish energy.
StoryFramework.ObjectiveDef.description: Seek a steam geyser and build a geothermal generator ontop of it.
